about_the_game:
Ever wanted to have good looking big icons to use on your project events, or even with your custom script? This is exactly what you need! A collection of 34 "High Resolution Crafted" icons, for you, to make you game look even more fancy! This time, Magic and Skills themed.

Features:

- 34 icons/pictures in 1024x1024
- 8 Elemental Icons: Fire, Earth, Wind, Water, Ice, Thunder, Light and Darkness.
- 7 Weapon/Fighting Icons: Sword, Staff, Spear, Gun, Bow & Arrow and Bare Hands (Punch).
- 4 Cosmic Icons: Galaxy, Planet, Meteor and Meteor 2.
- 4 Power Icons: Telekinesis, Telepathy, Transform and Power Up.
- 4 Healing Icons: Heal, Shield, Hands Energy and Revive.
- 7 Misc Icons: Time Magic, Magic Book, Plants, Charm (Hearts), Claws, Music and Reflect.
- Separated versions and Iconset ready versions included!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
